trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around December 26th 2011
Summary: very bright purple light, faded in and out, did abnornal movements
divs: Sighting Detailswhile walking my dog to the park, i noticed a very bright puple light off to my left. i stopped and looked at it. it was randonly moving, almost like it was enjoying itself. it would climb staight up, flip around, fade in and out of sight. it appeared to move from side ot side about half of my line sight. moving all directions, back and forth, up and down. a helicopter came in from behind me, from the west. i looked at my ipod to see the time, 10:50. as soon as this appeared and flew towards the object, going about a mile eastward. the object just blicked off, and was not seen again, at least for the next hour while i was at the park. all the time i was observing this happening, i was trying to find someone else to point it out. im not easily baffled, but this was unlike anything i had seen before. ive watched hang gliders, planes, even comets and falling stars. this did not act as they do. i am going back in the morning with camera, and see what happens
